sch:pattern.name: Profile
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating root element, Profile and UBL version

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS004] Invalid ProfileID: ''. Must be either Reference-Utility-1.0 or Reference-UtilityR-1.0

sch:pattern.name: UtilityStatement
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the UtilityStatement structure

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS006] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS010] Invalid UtilityStatementTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist

sch:pattern.name: ParentDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ParentDocumentReference class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS018] Invalid IssueDate. Must contain a value
[F-UTS019] Invalid DocumentTypeCode. Must contain a value
[F-UTS020] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS021] Invalid schemeAgencyID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS024] Invalid DocumentTypeCode: ''. Must be either 'Invoice' or 'CreditNote'

sch:pattern.name: AdditionalDocumentReference
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the AdditionalDocumentReference class

sch:pattern.name: Signature
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the Signature class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS027] Invalid ID. Must contain a value

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-UTS169] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: SenderParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the SenderParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS008] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS040] One PartyLegalEntity class must be present

sch:pattern.name: ReceiverParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the ReceiverParty class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS012] Invalid EndpointID. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-UTS041] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: BuyerCustomerParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the BuyerCustomerParty class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-UTS170] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: SubscriberParty
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the SubscriberParty class

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-UTS171] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:pattern.name: MainOnAccountPayment
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the MainOnAccountPayment class

sch:pattern.name: SubscriberConsumption
sch:pattern.sch:p: Pattern for validating the SubscriberConsumption class

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS030] Invalid ConsumptionID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS033] Invalid SpecificationTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-UTS034] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS035] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS036] Invalid schemeID: ''. Must be a valid scheme for ConsumptionPointID
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-UTS037] schemeID = GSRN, ID must be a valid GSRN number (123456789012345678)

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS172] Invalid SubscriberIDTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS042] Invalid URI. Must contain a value
[F-UTS043] Invalid Password. Must contain a value
[F-UTS044] Invalid Login. Must contain a value
[F-UTS047] Invalid MeterConstantCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS053] Invalid MeterReadingTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS056] Invalid UtilityStatementTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS057] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS060] Invalid ConsumptionTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS063] Invalid ConsumersEnergyLevelCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS066] Invalid ResidenseTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS069] Invalid HeatingTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS070] Invalid ConsumptionReportID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS073] Invalid ConsumptionTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS076] Invalid ConsumptionLevelCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS079] Invalid CorrectionTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS082] Invalid ExtendedSpecificationTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS085] Invalid PrivacyCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS086] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS087] Invalid PhoneNumber. Must contain a value
[F-UTS088] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS089] Invalid CallDate. Must contain a value
[F-UTS090] Invalid CallTime. Must contain a value
[F-UTS091] Invalid ServiceNumberCalled. Must contain a value
sch:rule.sch:report: [F-UTS092] When Country is used the element Country/IdentificationCode must be filled out

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS095] Invalid TelecommunicationsServiceCategoryCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS098] Invalid TelecommunicationsServiceCallCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist

sch:rule.sch:report: [W-UTS099] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one PriceChangeReason element is present
[W-UTS100] Multilanguage error. Replicated PriceChangeReason elements with same languageID attribute value

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS104] Invalid DutyCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS107] Invalid DutyCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS108] One PartyLegalEntity class must be present

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-UTS109] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS112] Invalid UtilityStatementTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS114] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS117] Invalid ConsumptionTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS120] Invalid ConsumersEnergyLevelCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS123] Invalid ResidenseTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS126] Invalid HeatingTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS127] Invalid ConsumptionReportID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS130] Invalid ConsumptionTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS133] Invalid ConsumptionLevelCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS136] Invalid CorrectionTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist

sch:pattern.sch:rule:
-->
[F-UTS137] Invalid ID. Must contain a value [F-UTS138] Use either Price or UnstructuredPrice [F-UTS139] You must provide either Price or UnstructuredPrice
[F-UTS173] AllowanceCharge.Amount can not be negative, if InvoicedQuantity or Price.PriceAmount is not negative. [F-UTS173] AllowanceCharge.Amount can not be negative, if InvoicedQuantity or Price.PriceAmount is not negative.

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-UTS149] Address is mandatory when ID is not specified
[F-UTS150] No more than one PartyLegalEntity class may be present

sch:rule.sch:assert: [F-UTS151] Invalid ID. Must contain a value
[F-UTS157] Invalid ConsumptionTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS160] Invalid CurrentChargeTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist
[F-UTS163] Invalid OneTimeChargeTypeCode: ''. Must be a value from the codelist

sch:rule.sch:report: [F-UTS165] No more than one ContractDocumentReference class may be present
[W-UTS166] The attribute languageID should be used when more than one PriceChangeReason element is present
[W-UTS167] Multilanguage error. Replicated PriceChangeReason elements with same languageID attribute value
